title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript modules to showcase my work and experiments.

title: California Weather Forecast
description: A sleek, interactive California weather dashboard that pulls real-time data from a live API and displays it with clean, modern visualizations.

title: Cosmic Dodger Game
description: A fast-paced browser arcade game where players dodge incoming asteroids and survive as long as possible.

title: Crypto Price Tracker
description: A real-time cryptocurrency price tracker that pulls live market data and displays it through an interactive, user-friendly dashboard.

title: Formula 1 Statistics and Data
description: A data-driven Formula 1 platform that integrates live race APIs, interactive charts, searchable profiles, and circuit analytics.

title: StudyFlow - Study Planner
description: A browser-based study management dashboard featuring dynamic filtering, localStorage persistence, and real-time productivity stats.

title: Sentiment Analyzer
description: A modular NLP sentiment analysis system with tokenization, lexicon processing, batch document evaluation, and exportable analytics.

title: Live Earthquake Dashboard
description: A real-time earthquake monitoring dashboard that visualizes live seismic activity on an interactive map with detailed event data.

title: Java Task Tracker
description: A Java-based task tracking application that lets users manage to-dos, deadlines, and priorities through a clean, console-driven interface.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe with AI
description: A smart Tic-Tac-Toe game featuring an AI opponent powered by the Minimax algorithm for optimal moves.

title: Data Structures Library
description: A modular C++ data structures collection featuring fully implemented and tested abstractions including linked lists, hash tables, trees, and graph structures.

title: MoodLog Mobile App
description: A clean and intuitive mobile app that helps users track daily moods, reflect on patterns, and build healthier emotional habits.
